name: Victoria
startIntroPart1: Greetings. They call me the Siege. Curious name, but it's got a nice ring to it.
startIntroPart2: Let's get straight to business. Don't let me get too bored.
declaringWar: Run while you can. Better to be a coward with a pulse than a martyr with a grave.
attacked: Tell me, is this battle inevitable?
defeated: For want of a nail... the kingdom was lost.
introduction: My rule is the balance your lives hang in.
afterPeace: Are we done here? A truce? Sure.
uniques: Damage is ignored when determining unit Strength <for [non-[Air]] units>
